And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> they shall bear thee up, <S%G142><s%> <S%G4571><s%> lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> thou dash <S%G4350><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone. <S%G3037><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he had been <S%G2258><s%> brought up: <S%G5142><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> custom <S%G1486><s%> was, he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> synagogue <S%G4864><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stood up <S%G450><s%> for to read. <S%G314><s%>

To preach <S%G2784><s%> the acceptable <S%G1184><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let us alone; <S%G1436><s%> what have we to do with thee, <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4671><s%> thou Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth? <S%G3479><s%> art thou come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? <S%G2248><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> thou art; <S%G1488><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy One <S%G40><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hold thy peace, <S%G5392><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1140><s%> had thrown <S%G4496><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> midst, <S%G3319><s%> he came <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hurt <S%G984><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not. <S%G3367><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> amazed, <S%G2285><s%> <S%G1096><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spake <S%G4814><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> is this! <S%G3778><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> he commandeth <S%G2004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they come out. <S%G1831><s%>
